mapper.insert: insert into reservation_tb(reservation_code, user_id, seat_id, reservated_at) values (#{reservationCode}, #{userId}, #{seatId}, now())
mapper.select: select movie_name, running_date, start_time, address, seat_name, theater_name, reservation_code from reservation_tb rt join seat_tb st on rt.seat_id = st.id join running_schedule_tb rst on st.running_schedule_id = rst.id join theater_tb tt on rst.id = tt.id join movie_tb mt on rst.id = mt.id where tb.id = #{id}
select id as last_id from reservation_tb where user_id = #{pricipalId} order by id desc limit 1

select m.thumbnail, m.movie_name, rs.running_date, rs.start_time, rs.end_time, s.seats, t.theater_name, p.final_price, r.reservation_code from reservation_tb as r inner join order_tb as o on r.id = o.reservation_id inner join payment_tb as p on o.id = p.order_id inner join seat_tb as s on s.id = r.seat_id inner join running_schedule_tb as rs on s.running_schedule_id = rs.id inner join theater_tb as t on t.id = rs.theater_id inner join movie_tb as m on m.id = rs.movie_id where r.user_id = #{principalId} and r.id = #{reservationId}

select m.thumbnail, m.movie_name, m.genre, p.final_price, r.reservation_code, m.online_release_date, m.online_end_date, m.d_day from reservation_tb as r inner join order_tb as o on r.id = o.reservation_id inner join payment_tb as p on o.id = p.order_id inner join funding_tb as f on f.id = o.funding_id inner join movie_tb as m on m.id = f.movie_id where r.user_id = #{principalId} and r.id = #{reservationId}
